title: My First Font: 'automotive'
content:
Hello everyone!

This is the first font I ever created.  
I called it ‘automotive’ because it was created for a magazine of the same name. It is used for headlines and logo. It's a unicase font.

I’d appreciate your critique very much!
author: Vykintas

comments.content:
The curves, particularly in the tops of the t, s and a, are wobbly... weird and unsettling. If that's what you're going for, great. If not, I'd suggest making the stroke width uniform, and the curves smoother.

-matt
